TopicTitle: Why are all SAS capabilities immediately available in KSP career mode?

Articles.Content: Immediately when I start a KSP career on moderate difficulty I have all the SAS abilities available during my first flight.  This happens regardless of if I fly with a pilot or engineer.  Anyone know why this is?  (I don't have any mods installed)
